Type Name Description
System.Int32 maximumRetries

The maximum number of retries.
TimeSpan initialPeriod

The retry initial period in milliseconds.
TimeSpan period

The retry period in milliseconds.
TimeSpan maximumExponentialPeriod

The maximum retry period if exponential.
TimeSpan timeout

The maximum retry total time.
System.Boolean exponential

Use exponential periods.
